element-citation.article-title: SARS-CoV-2 RNA in wastewater anticipated COVID-19 occurrence in a low prevalence area

note.p: This is the first peer-reviewed publication on the temporal surveillance of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater. This is the first study which assessed sample process performance using process control viruses. The investigation found SARS-CoV-2 RNA in secondary treated wastewater but not in tertiary treated effluent.
